name: hydrajs
description: Client side JavaScript library to interact with Hydra

scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run clean-test && tsc --outDir dist-test -t es2015 && ava -v
scripts.patch-release: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && if [[ -z "${HYDRA_HOSTNAME}" || -z "${RHN_USER}" || -z "${RHN_PASS}" ]]; then echo "Need set HYDRA_HOSTNAME, RHN_USER, RH_PASS"; exit 1; fi

author: Samuel Mendenhall <Samuel.Mendenhall@gmail.com> (https://github.com/engineersamuel)
